overview: Recognized for his level of professionalism, Azam Bacchus, a native New Yorker and NYU-Poly graduate has encyclopedic knowledge of New York’s finest areas. His expertise in SEO and market knowledge is highly sought-after in the business world. Azam offers his clients the highest level of personalized attention and negotiates the best possible deal when representing his clients. Azam’s desire to succeed continues to follow him throughout his career as he continues to service his client’s needs and helping them achieve their real estate goals.
